author: techbro_ccoli
content:
New EEST `devnet-1@v1.1.0` release: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/releases/tag/devnet-1%40v1.1.0

Adds the initial 7702 tests on top of the previous release.

author: chfast
content: EEST now requires rust. Isn't this a bit too much?

author: ak4222
content: What is your guys perspective when including 7702 tx and the correctness of single authority tuples, when including in tx pool and block production?

author: ak4222
content: A 7702 tx is still valid despite having a tuple with bad chain id or nonce or even authority with code, but what is your view on filtering for these things before block execution (pool and production)
